name: im-pact
description: "im pact" is Twitter crawler and bot for Producers and Everyone.

scripts.build: lerna run build --scope=server --stream && lerna run build --scope=client --stream
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test-ci: npm run test:server -- -- -- --coverage && npm run test:client -- -- -- --no-watch --code-coverage
scripts.test:client: lerna run build:api-client --scope=server && lerna run test --scope=client --stream
